article_title: SAP Stock Shows Rising Strength Amid An Executive Shift, Mixed Earnings
article_text: The Relative Strength (RS) Rating for SAP moved up into a higher percentile Monday, as it got a lift from 65 to 74. On April 20, the business operations management software maker said that co-CEO Jennifer Morgan stepped down from that position, leaving Christian Klein the sole CEO. CEO Klein said the company got off to a fast start this year before the pandemic put up a roadblock.
